thread.title: Senators Tester and Schatz’s Native Language immersion bill clears first hurdle (Jon Tester)
thread.title_full: Senators Tester and Schatz’s Native Language immersion bill clears first hurdle (Jon Tester) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Senators Tester and Schatz’s Native Language immersion bill clears first hurdle (Jon Tester)
text: ( Source : Jon Tester ) ( U.S. Senate )-Senators Jon Tester (D-Mont.) and Brian Schatz (D-Hawaii) today hailed the passage of their Native language immersion bill out of the Senate Indian Affairs Committee . The Native Language Immersion Student
